price: Bazawubamo mu gihe kingana n’icyo ibirere n'isi bizamara, uretse abo Nyagasani wawe azashaka (ko batawubamo ubuziraherezo). Mu by’ukuri Nyagasani wawe ni Ukora icyo ashaka.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā mā dāmati al-samāwātu wal-arḍu illā mā shāa rabbuka inna rabbaka faʿʿālun limā yurīdu
